thread.title: BRIEF-Party City Holdco Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.07

title: BRIEF-Party City Holdco Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.07
text:
May 9, 2018 / 11:06 AM / Updated 9 minutes ago BRIEF-Party City Holdco Reports Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share Of $0.07 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Party City Holdco Inc:
* PARTY CITY ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.01
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.05 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $2.44 BILLION TO $2.49 BILLION
* Q1 REVENUE $507.8 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $503.1 MILLION * BRAND COMPARABLE SALES INCREASED 2.4% DURING Q1
* SEES 2018 BRAND COMPARABLE SALES GROWTH OF APPROXIMATELY 1%
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.83, REVENUE VIEW $2.48 BILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
